title: special episode: getting to know the mona lisa
description:
In this special episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about what is considered to be the best known painting of all time — the Mona Lisa. Then, Maia will tell us all about her new single, called — wait for it — “Mona Lisa.” Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
